rooms.room_name: Entrance Hallway with Wheelchair Access Ramp
rooms.description: A spacious entrance hallway integrating a wheelchair-accessible ramp leading directly to the living area, designed with durable materials reflective of Brutalist style.
A large open-plan space combining the living room and modern kitchen. Incorporates wheelchair-accessible counters, appliances, and a central island that serves as both dining and prep area.
A designated guest suite on the ground floor for easy accessibility. Includes a separate bathroom and built-in storage.
A compact service area with a mud room, utility closet, and provisions for wheelchair access. Provides space for essential services.

openings.description: Double door entrance with a ramp and tactile guidance system ensuring wheelchair access. Reinforced with Brutalist materials.
A balcony overlooking the swimming pool area, offering exterior seating space. Complies with safety and accessibility norms.

rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom featuring an en-suite bathroom and a walk-in closet. Designed for comfort with direct access to the balcony.
A well-lit secondary bedroom on the first floor. Accessible via internal corridors and designed following Vastu guidelines.
A dedicated study room that doubles as a home office. Incorporates natural light and wheelchair accessibility features.
An additional bedroom to complete the five-bedroom configuration, designed with a private balcony and Vastu-compliant layout.
A full bathroom serving multiple rooms on the first floor, with accessibility enhancements such as grab bars and slip-resistant tiles.

openings.description: A wheelchair-accessible staircase with integrated railings and a ramp alternative for ease of movement between floors.

openings.opening_name: Balcony Access to the Swimming Pool Deck
openings.description: Provides access from the first floor to an extended deck area around the swimming pool, ensuring connectivity and safety.

rooms.description: An attic space designed for storage, utilities, and future expansion possibilities. Maintains the Brutalist aesthetic with exposed concrete elements.
